item.title: Consul安装
item.author: root@ysicing.net (ysicing)
item.description: 通过helm快速安装helm # 默认已存在默认sc kubectl get sc nfs-data (default) nfs-data Delete Immediate false 206d 安装consul helminit kubectl create ns gaea-op helm upgrade -i consul --set global.imageRegistry=registry.cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com \ --set image.repository=k7scn/b-consul \ --set volumePermissions.enabled=true \ --set volumePermissions.image.repository=k7scn/b-minideb \ --set persistence.enabled=true \ --set metrics.enabled=true \ --set
item.dc:creator: ysicing
